examples: She filled the bottle with water.
He opened a bottle of soda.
The baby drank milk from a bottle.
Ela encheu a garrafa com água.
Ele abriu uma garrafa de refrigerante.
O bebê bebeu leite na mamadeira.

suggested: Why did the soda bottle go to therapy? Because it had a lot of fizzical issues to work through!
Seeing empty bottles littered on the streets can be a sad reminder of the waste in our environment.
I get so angry when people throw away plastic bottles instead of recycling them.
Did you know that glass bottles can be recycled and reused endlessly without losing their quality?
The distinct smell of a freshly opened bottle of perfume or cologne.
The cool sensation of condensation on the surface of a cold beverage bottle.
Bottled messages have been used throughout history as a way to connect with others across vast distances.
